name: Davron of Stormwind
rules: On your turn: 1, Flip Davron -> Target hero or ally can't protect this turn.

name: Elycia of Gilneas
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Elycia -> Target hero or ally has +2 ATK and Stealth this turn. (It can't be protected against.)

name: Edaan of the Exodar
rules: On your turn: 1, Flip Edaan -> Edaan heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Gazriz of Gnomeregan
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Gazriz -> Gazriz deals 2 shadow damage to target ally and heals 1 damage from himself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Kamu of Thunder Bluff
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Kamu -> Kamu deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally for each hero and ally you control.

name: Naedia of Silvermoon City
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Naedia -> Naedia deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Stromdak of Ironforge
rules: On your turn: 5, Flip Stromdak -> Search your deck for an equipment, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: Teretha of the Undercity
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Teretha -> Target opponent chooses an ally he controls and puts it into its owner's hand.

name: Zumix of Kezan
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Zumix -> Draw two cards.

name: Zunjo of Sen'jin
rules: On your turn: 2, Flip Zunjo -> Target ally has -4 ATK this turn.

name: Aggressive Infiltration
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to each exhausted opposing hero and ally.

name: Annihilate
rules: Destroy target exhausted ally or equipment.

name: Armed to the Teeth
rules: Your hero deals melee damage to target ally equal to 3 plus the number of equipment you have.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Black Blood
rules: Your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target ally. If you control a Disease, your hero also deals 5 shadow damage to target hero.

name: Blessing of Might
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Attached character has +1 ATK while attacking.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Twilight of the Dragons,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Bestowed upon the worthy, increased might can facilitate great deeds.

name: Blessing of the Templar
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: Attached hero has Assault 3 and Mend 3.

name: Blistering Fire
rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero.
flavour: Sometimes, the direct approach works best.

name: Blood Chill
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero. If damage is dealt this way, exhaust each opposing hero or ally with Protector.

name: Breath of the Elements
rules: Ready each ally you control.
flavour: Feel the surging elements invigorate your mind, bodym and soul. - Malaxia Wizwhirl

name: Chains of Ice
rules: Attach to target opposing ally. Search your deck for a Disease, reveal it, and put it into your hand.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack.

name: Chasten
rules: Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Cold Front
rules: Allies can't attack this turn.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: I'll freeze you all! - The Shade of Aran

name: Crippling Shot
rules: Target hero or ally has -5 ATK this turn.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: A well-placed shot can weaken the strongest arm and slow the swiftest hand.

name: Dark Extortion
rules: Target player chooses an ally he controls. Gain control of that ally.
flavour: What a shame your will was not as strong as your body. Now they both belong to me. - Tilly Fiddlelight

name: Earth and Moon
rules: Balance Hero Required; Ongoing: If a hero or ally you control would deal arcane ([Arcane]) or nature ([Nature]) damage, it deals that much +2 instead.

name: Earth Mother's Blessing
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally had +3 ATK / +3 health.; When attached ally is destroyed, draw a card.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: From nature comes everything. Those who appreciate that may partake of its bounty. - Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem

name: Elements' Fury
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero and 3 nature damage to target ally.

name: Explosive Shot
rules: Survival Hero Required;Destroy target opposing ally. If you do, your hero deals fire damage equal to that ally's cost to a second target hero or ally.

name: Fel Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to each non-Demon hero and ally.
flavour: These unholy alliances are not without their rewards. - Victor Baltus

name: Fire Power
rules: Fire Hero Required; Ongoing: When you play a Fire ability or Fire card, your hero may deal 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Fire magi focus their training on maximizing the potency and impact of their fire-based spells.

name: Flesh Eating Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 5 nature damage to attached character.

name: Frost Fever
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero. Allies in attached hero's party lose and can't have Assault and Mend.

name: Greater Chain Lightning
rules: Target up to five heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.
flavour: Don't stand so close to me! - The last words of Sordin Gumner, lead singer of the Azeroth Authority

name: Invoke the Nether
rules: Remove all allies from the game.
reprinted: March of the Legion,March of the Legion (EA),Archive
flavour: It all ends here. - Forang Deathrattle

name: Mind Spike
rules: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Its controller discards a card for each damage dealt.
flavour: Victims of a shadow priest seldom remember why they're victims.

name: Natural Selection
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally; or your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Path of Frost
rules: Put target ally from your graveyard on top of your deck.
flavour: For Magni's sake, how do you get away from these lads? - Bragvi Stormstein

name: Pernicious Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that your hero dealt combat damage to this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 nature damage to attached character.
flavour: The venom from a serpent is a minor inconvenience compared to what these rogues use.

name: Power Word: Vigor
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 [Health].
flavour: Maybe this will help keep you from dying so easily. - Xerandaal, Shade Servitor

name: Prayer of Fortitude
rules: Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +5 health.
flavour: Just as the Light connects all our hearts and souls, so let it protect us now in these dark and troubled times. - Kintara Wintermoon

name: Rend
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to attached character.
flavour: I gave him a choice: die piece by piece, or all at once. - Gorebelly

name: Repentance
rules: Retribution Hero Required; Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment that damage was dealt with or dealt by this turn.
flavour: Allow me to show you the proper way to atone for your actions. - Rekwa Proudhorn

name: Spoils of the Hunt
rules: Destroy all opposing allies that have or share the highest cost among opposing allies.

name: Stance Mastery
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Your hero has +1 ATK this combat.
flavour: There is no difference between offense and defense. - Peter Hottelet

name: Steady Shot
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero may deal 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Draw... inhale... exhale... release. - Amaria Kelsur

name: Summoning Portal
rules: Search your deck for an ally, reveal it, and put it into your hand
flavour: Now is not the time to be shy. - Victor Baltus

name: Surge of Blood
rules: Your hero deal 2 melee damage to target hero or ally. Weapons you control have Assault 2 this turn.

name: Turn the Blade
rules: Attach to target ally or weapon.;Ongoing: Attached card has -3 ATK.
reprinted: Drums Of War,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Champion Decks
flavour: You can fo more with a bow than just fire it. - The Greatest Race of Hunters

name: Alador Stonebrew
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Times are tough, lad, but I'll always have yer back.

name: Babagahnoosh the Grumpy
rules: When this ally enters play, turn all resources you control face down and discard your hand.
flavour: Out of my way - I have important matters to attend to!

name: Bella Wilder
rules: This ally has Ferocity while you control another [Nature] card.

name: Bogspike
rules: When Bogspike enter play, he may deal 1 melee damage to target ally.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: In Zangarmarsh, it's difficult to tell the spore bats from the trees.

name: Bolvar, Highlord of Fordragon Hold
rules: Untargetable;When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card named Fordragon Hold and put it into your resource row face up and exhausted.;Death Rattle: Put each location you control into it's owner's hand.

name: Burly Berta
rules: Assault 2;When this ally deals damage to a hero, you may draw a card.;Death Rattle: Target ally you control has Assault 2 this turn.
flavour: Her actions speak lounder than her words ever could.

name: Chops
rules: When Chops attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: I can't see who's winnin' - but it's probably not the guy under the boar.

name: Claemora Amberglare
rules: When this ally enters play, target hero or ally has Assault 2 this turn. (+2 ATK on your turn

name: Crusty
rules: Protector;When Crusty deals combat damage to an ally, he may also deal that much melee damage to a second target hero or ally.

name: Deathlord Jones
rules: When this ally enters play, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Unique Ghoul ally token named Brode into play exhausted with This ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.;Once per turn, on your turn: 3 -> This ally deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Ready a Ghoul you control.

name: Dhoros Ravestrike
rules: 3 -> This ally has Assault 3 this turn.

name: Doom
rules: Assault 4 (This ally has +4 ATK on your turn)

name: Drizzie Steelslam
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);When this ally enters play, you may put target equipment into its owner's hand.
flavour: Such shoddy craftsmanship! Clearly gnomish in nature.

name: Forager Cloudbloom
rules: When Cloudbloom readies, draw a card.
flavour: The fallen grant us their wisdom from the future.

name: Fury
rules: Ferocity
flavour: A faint rustling of brush, a whirlwind of tooth and claw - and silence. Such is the fate of Fury's prey.

name: Garrosh Hellscream
rules: Protector;Each ally you control has Assault X, where X is its printed ATK.
flavour: The Lich King sought to sow the seeds of fear. Let me be the first to show him the Horde fears nothing!

name: Gorz Blazefist
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Orc and fire have so very much in common.

name: Guardian Steelhoof
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.) This ally can't attack.
flavour: The land cries out to us for protection. Who are you to ignore her?

name: Haaroon
rules: Demonology Hero Required; Protector

name: Haranto Darkstrider
rules: Protector;This ally can't attack unless an opponent controls more allies than you.

name: High Commander Halford Wyrmbane
rules: Protector This ally has Assault 1 and Mend 1 for each other ally you control.
flavour: The first strike belongs to us, and the last strike is all that our enemies see.

name: Hira
flavour: The flames dance before my fingertips like puppets dance for their master.

name: Huruk Lightvow
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Jaina, Lady of Theramore
rules: Frost Resistance;Each opponent pays 1 more to play cards that share a card type with a card in his graveyard. You pay 1 less to play cards that share a card type with a card in your graveyard, to a minimum of 1
flavour: The longer you insist upon confronting me, the more agonizing you will find defeat.

name: Jinie Swizzleshade
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Let's see how the raging elements handle a heavy dose of the shadows.

name: Kalek Deepearth
rules: Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: Let's hope what the new tribunal can lead us as well as Magni did, lad.

name: Kalnuf Eagleheart
rules: When Kalnuf Eagleheart enters play, look at target player's hand.
flavour: His eyes are as sharp as those of his namesake.

name: Ka'tali Stonetusk
rules: Protector; At the start of your turn, Ka'tali Stonetusk heals 1 damage from himself.
flavour: You come get the voodoo.

name: Kirga Earthguard
rules: Protector;At the end of your turn, ready Kirga.
flavour: Kirga learned from the best, her older sibling Kulan.

name: Kistix Shockvat
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Don't get me wrong - I love explosives, but sometimes you just gotta work with your hands.

name: Koeus
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an ability, you may destroy target ability.

name: Laenthor Shademoon
flavour: The Highborne have been in hiding for too long. It is time for them to rejoin their brethren.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
rules: When Leeroy Jenkins enters play, exhaust all other allies in your party. They can't ready during your next ready step.; Say Leeeerooooy Jenkins! -> Leeroy has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: Let's do this!

name: Mooncaller Jynalla Nightpath
rules: This ally has +3 / +3 and Protector while you control a Shout.

name: Nakistis, Exodar Armorer
rules: This ally has +1 / +1 while you control an armor.

name: Nala Stalks-the-Night
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.);Stealth (Can't protect against this character.)

name: Nami Dabpox
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: It's easy to underestimate what you can't see.

name: Nethermaven Donna Chastain
rules: Assault 3

name: Onnekra Bloodfang
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.) This ally can attack only heroes.
flavour: Her single-mindedness is her greatest strength.

name: Oruk Starstorm
flavour: The moon is always within my call.

name: Plainswatcher Taro
rules: Protector While you control four or more cards in play with the same name, you may play Taro without paying his cost.
flavour: When you need me, my blade is yours.

name: Ra'chee
rules: When Ra'chee enters play, he heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Voodoo be good for you, mon.

name: Ruon Wildhoof
rules: Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)

name: Saurfang the Younger, Kor'kron Warlord
rules: Ferocity When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card named Kor'kron Vanguard, reveal it, and put it into your hand.;Death Rattle: Turn all locations you control face down.
flavour: Rise up, sons of the Horde! Blood and glory await us!

name: Shanis Bladefall
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: The Aspect of Death must soon face those who have been reborn in undeath.

name: Terina Calin
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an equipment, you may destroy target equipment.

name: Tez Tez the Patchmonger
rules: When Tez Tez enters play, target opposing ally has -3 ATK this turn.
flavour: I share da voodoo wit choo, mon, no charge.

name: Thrall, Warchief of the Horde
rules: Protector, Frost Resistance;When this ally enters play, you may put target [Horde] card from your graveyard into your hand. Other [Horde] allies you control have +2/+2.
flavour: Be bathed in my power! Drink in my might! Battle for the glory of the Horde!

name: Tinker Casey Springlock
rules: Case is a Protector while she's undamaged.
flavour: This shield will stop anything… once.

name: Vala Carville
flavour: I've spent a lifetime studying, and now it's time to show you what I've learned.

name: Voss Treebender
rules: When Voss Treebender attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

name: Wyndarr Shadefist
rules: This ally has Stealth while an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or less.

name: Zip
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
flavour: The cries of laughter upon seeing the tallstrider quickly turn to cries of pain.

name: Zulanji
flavour: Joo have to learn to trust me, mon!

name: Zulbraka
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Dis is gonna get hairy. Joo wit me?

name: Zuur
rules: When this ally enters play, you may put target [Nature] card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Before it turns into mulch, allow me.

name: Abomination Knuckles
rules: When this equipment enters play, you may destroy target armor or item.
flavour: You don't want to know what I had to do to get this. - Caleb Pavish

name: Angry Dread
rules: When this weapon enters play, you may draw a card.

name: Colossal Skull-Clad Cleaver
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a skull counter. This weapon has Assault 1 for each skull counter.

name: Edgemaster's Handguards
rules: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.
flavour: These invaluable handguards steady even the most unskilled of hands.

name: Hersir's Greatspear
rules: When an ally enters play under your control, your hero may deal 1 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Silent Crusader
rules: When an opponent's hero is dealt combat damage with this weapon, exhaust all cards he controls.

name: Spire of Sunset
rules: On your turn: 2, Exhaust your hero -> Your hero deals fire damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of different classes among heroes and allies you control.

name: Stakethrower
rules: This equipment enters play with a stake counter. Long-Range (When you strike with this weapon on your turn, defenders deal no combat damage to the attacker.) Remove a stake counter -> This weapon has +3 ATK this combat.

name: Warmace of Menethil
rules: When damage is dealt with this equipment, draw a card.
flavour: Remember, our line has always ruled with wisdom and strength. - Terenas Menethil II

name: Fordragon Hold
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target [Alliance] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.;If you control an ally with Bolvar in its name: [Exhaust] -> [Alliance] heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.

name: Kor'kron Vanguard
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.;If you control an ally with Saurfang in its name: [Exhaust] -> Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 3 this turn.

name: Blueleaf Tubers
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: Those tubers are impossible to find unless you know just where to look. That's why I've trained these snufflenose gophers to find them for me.

name: Brothers in Death
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

name: Mystery Goo
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: The greenish substance inside the caukdron appears to be similar to what you found in the flask.

name: The Essence of Enmity
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: The creatures you seek swarn over the Den of Flame to the northwest and the Stonemaul Ruins to the north. - Brogg

name: The Grimtotem Weapon
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: I'll loan the totem to you if you agree to help me test it. - Apprentice Garion

name: The Ichor of Undeath
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: The Key to Freedom
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The small brass key looks simple enough.

name: What Illidan Wants, Illidan Gets
rules: If a Demon is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: You're going to have to act your heart out. - Borok, Son of Oronok

name: Horn of Winter
rules: Heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn. They have +1 ATK on your turn.)
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: The last sound you'll hear before death grips your soul. - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Outbreak
rules: Opposing allies have -X / -X this turn, where X is the cost of a Disease you control.
flavour: The spread of flames may be quick and destructive, but the spread of disease is a sign of real power. - Aric Stonejack

name: Brutal Bear Form
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Protector. (It may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Allies you control have Assault 1. They have +1 ATK on your turn.)

name: Celestial Moonfire
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 arcane damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if this ability is in play, your hero deals 2 arcane damage to attached character.;On your turn: Exhaust an [Arcane] ally you control -> Put this ability into its owner's hand.

name: Blessing of Faith
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1.;2, Destroy this ability -> Destroy target ability.
flavour: Trust in the Light to cure all ills. - Gundek Hammerguard

name: Inquisition
rules: Target ally deals unpreventable holy damage to itself equal to its ATK.
flavour: Run all you like. Justice will eventually find you. - Sunwalker Nahano

name: Expel
rules: Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target ally for each ally you control.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Mind Melt
rules: Shadow Talent (You can't put Discipline Talents or Holy Talents in your deck.);Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. That character's controller discards a card for each damage dealt this way.
flavour: When I'm finished with you, you won't even remeber your name. - Olivia Demascas

name: Infiltrate
rules: Up to two target heroes and/or allies have Assault 2 and Stealth this turn. (They have +2 ATK on your turn and can't be protected against.)
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Stick to the shadows. You'll live a lot longer that way. - Zimzi the Trickster

name: Shadow Dance
rules: Subtlety Talent (You can't put Assassination Talents or Combat Talents in your deck.);Your hero has Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.;Ongoing: When you play a [Rogue] ability, your hero has Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.

name: Trickster's Gambit
rules: The next time damage would be dealt to your hero this turn, it's dealt to another target hero or ally instead.
flavour: You must be ready to change your focus at a moment's notice. - Zimzi the Trickster

name: Ancestral Recovery
rules: Put up to two target allies from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Rise and be renewed, brothers and sisters! - Bragvi Stormstein

name: Dread Touch
rules: Put target opposing ally into its owner's hand. Then, that player discard a card.
flavour: I have seen da voodoo and da mojo, mon, and now it's time to show what da Nether can do. - Uzak'zim

name: Maazhum
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 3 shadow damage to target hero and heals 3 damage from your hero.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Enraged Regeneration
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon while attacking, it heals 3 damage from itself.
flavour: Nobody makes me bleed my own blood! - Jai Dawnsteel

name: Arvos Jadestone
rules: Mend 1(At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: In Magni's name, we must do all we can to reclaim the land.

name: Dagin Bootzap
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Make the first shot count, laddie.

name: Jeniva Prescott
rules: When this ally enters play, she may heal 4 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: I may not be able to lift this curse, but that does not mean the Light has abandoned me.

name: Patricia Potter
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: I shall embrace the fire and harness its power to do my bidding!

name: Burom Bladeseer
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: In my deepest meditations, I hear the faint voice of Thrall as he tries to keep all of Azeroth from breaking.

name: Kuatha Mornhoof
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: May you bask in the light of the sun.

name: Nikka Blastbor
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: There is no shortage of prey for me here on these Lost Isles.

name: Valytha Colton
flavour: The Dark Lady commands, and we obey.

name: A Bird In Hand
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ally, put it into your hand.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: The Harpies communicate across the ridge using a series of signal fires. If we extinguish one, Marion is sure to come investigate. - Thisalee Crow

name: Entrenched
rules: If you control an ally: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself. - Kor the Immovable

name: Forged of Shadow and Flame
rules: If you control an equipment: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The weapons the Twilight's Hammer uses against us are crafted by Forgemaster Pyrenduis within these very halls. - Jordan Olafson

name: Yazli Earthspark
rules: When this ally attacks, she may deal 2 nature damage to target hero.

name: Falixia Frizzleblast
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)

name: Knight Karia
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Kelsa Wildfire
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Beware the raging fury of flames!

name: Glacial Strike
rules: Your hero deals 5 frost damage to target ally.
flavour: Your pain will be blissfully numbing. - Dragonslayer Drux

name: Hungering Cold
rules: Frost Talent (You can't put Blood Talents or Unholy Talents in your deck.);Ongoing: When an opposing hero or ally exhausts, your hero deals 1 frost damage to it.

name: Tears of Aessina
rules: Your hero heals 2 damage from each of up to two target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Da wounded forests of Hyjal done brought even da ancients to tears. - Sumi'jin, Guardian of Cenarius

name: Favor of the Hunt
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Favor of the Arcane
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, draw a card.

name: Ring of Frost
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to each ready opposing ally.
flavour: Be still, even for just a moment. - Nomak the Blazingclaw

name: Favor of Spirit
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.

name: Favor of Mischief
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, target opponent discards a card.

name: Inferno Totem
rules: At the start of your turn, this Totem deals 4 fire damage to target opposing hero.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Twilight of the Dragons
flavour: It takes just one spark to ignite an overwhelming inferno. - Earthseer Nakza

name: Primal Strike
rules: Target ally or weapon has +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: The rush of the elements will prove to be move than enough to get the job done. - Earthseer Nakza

name: Selora
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.);When this ally enters play, target ally has +1 / -1 this turn.

name: Heroic Leap
rules: Exhaust up to two target heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 1 melee damage to each character exhausted this way.
flavour: Hiyyaaaahhh! - Fraznak the Furious

name: Windspeaker Nuvu
rules: When this ally attacks for the first time each turn, ready him.
flavour: A flurry of steel is all the Twilight's Hammer will see!

name: Stargazer Ronal
rules: When this ally is destroyed, you may shuffle target player's graveyard into his deck.
flavour: We must follow the lead of Cenarius and Malfurion if we hope to stand against the Firelord.

name: Roger Ulric
flavour: I've got your scent now - there's no escape!

name: Haratha Hammerflame
rules: When this ally is destroyed, she may deal 3 fire damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: With each passing day, hope continues to fade, but we must press on if we are to defeat Deathwing.

name: Brel Blazebeard
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.);When your hero or another ally you control deals fire ([Fire]) damage, this ally has Assault 2 this turn. (He has +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Control your emotions, lad, or the flames will never obey your command.

name: Claws of Torment
rules: Your hero has Dual Wield. (You can control a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. You can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

name: Crul'korak, the Lightning's Arc
rules: [Nature] allies you control have Assault X, where X is the ATK of this weapon.
flavour: The sinister energy Nefarion used to raise Onyxia still crackles on the blade. - Earthseer Nakza

name: Obsidium Executioner
flavour: Only the most seasoned blacksmiths would be able to craft this fine a blade. - Dar'thael the Bloodsworn

name: Kyroth Steelspite
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Opponents can't strike with weapons.
flavour: I think I'm going to get along with the new Warchief just fine...

name: Arcane Shot
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.; Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,War of the Elements,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: A hunter's deadly accuracy doesn't just seem like magic; sometimes, it is.

name: Battle Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: For Lordaeron! For Khaz Modan! For the Horde! Azeroth has heard them all.

name: Chain Heal
rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Your hero heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Consecration
rules: Your hero deals 2 holy damage to each hero and ally in target player's party. That damage can't be prevented.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: My church is the field of battle. - Uther Lightbringer

name: Energized
rules: Ready target ally.
flavour: Let's go!

name: Entangling Roots
rules: Attach to target ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: The vines grew angry, as if every weed of Azeroth sought revenge upon those who would destroy their fertile home.

name: Execute
rules: Destroy target ally with damage on it.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: Showing weakness to a warrior is a death sentence.

name: Fire Blast
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive

name: Fireball
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 4 fire damage to it.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Twilight of the Dragons,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Flash Heal
rules: Your hero heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Frost Nova
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: Litori's pursers found themselves quite literally frozen in their tracks.

name: Frost Shock
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: There is only one kind of cold the dwarves of Dun Morogh fear.

name: Frostbolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: Wearing heavy plate is taxing enough without having to lug around another eighty pounds of ice. - Warrax

name: Gouge
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Every being has vulnerable spots; make it your business to know them all. -The assassin's Creed, Chapter 2

name: Hammer of Justice
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.; Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Archive
flavour: Justice in Azeroth is in short supply, but merciless when it does arrive.

name: Holy Light
rules: Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.; Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: The third and most important of the Light's virtues is compassion. - Uther the Lightbringer

name: Immolate
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 fire damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Kill Command
rules: Target Pet in your party deals melee damage equal to its ATK to target ally.
flavour: In truth, she needs no order to kill. I only tell her whom to spare.

name: Life Tap
rules: As an additional cost to play Life Tap, put 2 damage on your hero.; Draw two cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Archive
flavour: When the dark arts cal for flesh, you can only trust your own.

name: Lightning Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Shamans know that lightning can strike twice in the same place.

name: Mana Agate
rules: Ongoing: 1, Destroy Mana Agate -> Draw 2 cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: Magi are unique in their ability to store mana for future use without alchemical aid.

name: Mark of the Wild
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK and +2 health.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: May Cenarius smile upon you. - Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem

name: Polymorph
rules: Attach to target ally.; Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses all powers, and is a sheep.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Baaaaa.

name: Shadow Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.;When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Archive
flavour: May darkness take you, for when I'm done, the Light will not recognize you. - Radak Doombringer

name: Slay the Feeble
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: If a rogue is present, it's never a fair fight.

name: Starfire
rules: Your hero deals 5 arcane damage to target hero or ally.; Draw a card.
flavour: The very heavens echoed the druid's rage and opened up at his command.

name: Steal Essence
rules: Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt.
flavour: Tonight, I'll drink to your health - may it long be mine.

name: Wrath
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive
flavour: Nature's fury is awesome to behold.

name: Acid Hands McGillicutty

name: Alecia Hall

name: Benethor Draigo
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: In life he cooked meat for his brothers. In death he cooked his brothers for meat.

name: Besora Galefeather
